channel.title: How to make Co-owner with crown? ( character rights 5)
channel.description:
Dear, Moparscape coders/people,
How to make a co-owner with a crown? I made co-owner character rights 5, but it dont have a admin crown.:( Do some1 know how to make?:) Anyways,Thanks
I D D S I

item.title: How to make Co-owner with crown? ( character rights 5)
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:8, topic:218945”][quote author=-N- link=topic=287647.msg2326432#msg2326432 date=1215719504]
Like this.

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co-Owner's name here")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Fallen Isle's Coder & Owner, Co-Owner's name here, has logged in!";

and where to put it xD

[/quote][/quote]

When you log in does your server say “Welcome to …”?

Ok, I’m not getting feedback.

Just right under where it says “Welcome to (Your Server)!”

After the last bracket add what I previously posted

Read full topic
item.source: How to make Co-owner with crown? ( character rights 5)

item.title: How to make Co-owner with crown? ( character rights 5)
item.dc:creator: @WrittenBlade WrittenBlade
item.description:
@WrittenBlade wrote:

Make the co-owner with playerName. If you have the login message for playerRights (such as Mod Blah has logged in), do something using playerName. That is how my server does it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make Co-owner with crown? ( character rights 5)
